title: Creating a 3D Model of a Camera Bag with Close-Range Photogrammetry
description: In this mini project, we're using a special computer program to make a 3D version of a camera bag. It's like taking a bunch of pictures and turning them into a 3D model! First, the program helps us find important points in the pictures automatically. Then, we make sure everything looks just right by adjusting things manually. Finally, we get a 3D version of the camera bag.

title: Simple Todo List App with React
description: This simple Todo List App, built using React, offers a user-friendly interface for managing tasks. This app allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, and it saves the tasks in the local storage. This project serves as an excellent starting point for me as a beginner in React, showcasing basic state management and local storage usage in a practical application.

title: CariKontur App with React and TailwindCSS
description: CariKontur is an application designed to simplify the process of manually creating physical maps by helping with the calculation and placement of contour lines. CariKontur helps users to accurately determine the position of contours on a physical map, thereby reducing the time and effort required for manual contour mapping.

title: Simple Interactive Map Data Visualizations
description: A simple interactive map data visualization  using a choropleth map to represent the percentage of the population living in poverty in the regencies and cities (kota/kabupaten) of Jawa Barat in 2023 using data from BPS.

title: Safe Talk Anonymous Message Webpage
description: The anonymous message webpage is a basic online platform where users can submit messages without revealing their identity. The message is stored securely and can only be accessed by the owner.
